roleset.name: overwhelm
roleset.note: OVERWHELM-V NOTES: Only use the instrument arg when the agent arg is also present. (from overwhelm.01-v)
OVERWHELMED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from overwhelmed.01-j)
OVERWHELMING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from overwhelming.01-j)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: The issue's smooth absorption eased fears that supply would overwhelm demand in coming sessions, traders said.

example.name: all args
example.text: John overwhelmed his dissertation committee with the brilliance of his arguments.
example.arg: with the brilliance of his arguments
